query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 La spada di qua sù non taglia in fretta 17 né tardo, ma’ ch’al parer di colui 18 che disïando o temendo l’aspetta.
query.result:
**English:**
16 The sword from up there does not cut quickly 17 nor slowly, but according to the opinion of the one 18 who awaits it, desiring or fearing it.
**Malay:**
16 Pedang dari atas sana tidak memotong dengan cepat 17 atau lambat, tetapi menurut pendapat orang 18 yang menginginkannya atau takut akan hal itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Ma rivolgiti omai inverso altrui; 20 ch’assai illustri spiriti vedrai, 21 se com’ io dico l’aspetto redui».
query.result:
**English:**
19 But turn now to others; 20 for you will see many illustrious spirits, 21 if you reduce your gaze as I tell you.
**Malay:**
19 Tetapi berpalinglah sekarang kepada yang lain; 20 karena kamu akan melihat banyak roh yang mulia, 21 jika kamu mengurangi pandanganmu seperti yang kukatakan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Come a lei piacque, li occhi ritornai, 23 e vidi cento sperule che ’nsieme 24 più s’abbellivan con mutüi rai.
query.result:
**English:**
22 As it pleased her, I turned my eyes, 23 and I saw a hundred little spheres that together 24 adorned themselves more with their mutual rays.
**Malay:**
22 Seperti yang disukainya, aku memalingkan mataku, 23 dan aku melihat seratus bola kecil yang bersama-sama 24 lebih menghiasi diri mereka sendiri dengan sinar yang saling berbalasan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Poi dentro a lei udi’: «Se tu vedessi 32 com’ io la carità che tra noi arde, 33 li tuoi concetti sarebbero espressi.
query.result:
**English:**
31 Then within her I heard: "If you could see 32 how the charity burns among us, 33 your thoughts would be expressed.
**Malay:**
31 Kemudian di dalam dirinya aku mendengar: "Jika kamu bisa melihat 32 bagaimana kasih sayang yang membara di antara kita, 33 pikiran-pikiranmu akan terungkapkan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Ma perché tu, aspettando, non tarde 35 a l’alto fine, io ti farò risposta 36 pur al pensier, da che sì ti riguarde.
query.result:
**English:**
34 But why do you, waiting, not hasten 35 to the high end, I will answer you 36 even in thought, since it so concerns you.
**Malay:**
34 Tetapi mengapa engkau, yang menunggu, tidak bergegas 35 ke tujuan yang tinggi, aku akan menjawabmu 36 bahkan dalam pikiran, karena itu sangat mengganggumu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 Questi altri fuochi tutti contemplanti 47 uomini fuoro, accesi di quel caldo 48 che fa nascere i fiori e ’ frutti santi.
query.result:
**English:**
46 All these other fires contemplating 47 were men, kindled with that warmth 48 which makes the holy flowers and fruits be born.
**Malay:**
46 Semua api lainnya yang merenungkan 47 adalah manusia, yang dinyalakan oleh kehangatan itu 48 yang membuat bunga-bunga dan buah-buahan suci lahir.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Qui è Maccario, qui è Romoaldo, 50 qui son li frati miei che dentro ai chiostri 51 fermar li piedi e tennero il cor saldo».
query.result:
**English:**
49 Here is Macarius, here is Romualdus, 50 here are my brothers who within the cloisters 51 halted their feet and kept their hearts steadfast."
**Malay:**
49 Di sini ada Macarius, di sini ada Romualdus, 50 di sini ada saudara-saudaraku yang di dalam biara-biara 51 menghentikan langkah mereka dan menjaga hati mereka tetap teguh."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 E io a lui: «L’affetto che dimostri 53 meco parlando, e la buona sembianza 54 ch’io veggio e noto in tutti li ardor vostri,
55 così m’ha dilatata mia fidanza, 56 come ’l sol fa la rosa quando aperta 57 tanto divien quant’ ell’ ha di possanza.
query.result:
**English:**
52 And I to him: "The affection that you show 53 in speaking with me, and the good countenance 54 that I see and note in all your ardor,
55 have so dilated my trust, 56 as the sun does the rose when it opens 57 and becomes as large as it has the power to be.
**Malay:**
52 Dan aku kepadanya: "Kasih sayang yang kau tunjukkan 53 berbicara denganku, dan kebaikan 54 yang kulihat dan kuketahui dalam semua semangatmu,
55 telah begitu mengembangkan kepercayaanku, 56 seperti matahari mengembangkan bunga mawar ketika terbuka 57 dan menjadi sebesar yang dimilikinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Però ti priego, e tu, padre, m’accerta 59 s’io posso prender tanta grazia, ch’io 60 ti veggia con imagine scoverta».
query.result:
**English:**
58 But I pray you, and you, father, assure me 59 if I can take so much grace, that I 60 may see you with unveiled image.
**Malay:**
58 Tetapi aku mohon padamu, dan kamu, bapa, yakinkan aku 59 jika aku dapat mengambil begitu banyak rahmat, sehingga aku 60 dapat melihatmu dengan gambaran yang tidak terselubung.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Ond’ elli: «Frate, il tuo alto disio 62 s’adempierà in su l’ultima spera, 63 ove s’adempion tutti li altri e ’l mio.
query.result:
**English:**
61 Then he said to me: "Brother, your lofty desire 62 will be fulfilled in the highest sphere, 63 where all other desires and mine are fulfilled.
**Malay:**
61 Kemudian dia berkata kepadaku: "Saudaraku, keinginanmu yang tinggi 62 akan terpenuhi di alam tertinggi, 63 di mana semua keinginan lainnya dan keinginanku terpenuhi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Ivi è perfetta, matura e intera 65 ciascuna disïanza; in quella sola 66 è ogne parte là ove sempr’ era,
67 perché non è in loco e non s’impola; 68 e nostra scala infino ad essa varca, 69 onde così dal viso ti s’invola.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Infin là sù la vide il patriarca 71 Iacobbe porger la superna parte, 72 quando li apparve d’angeli sì carca.
query.result:
**English:**
70 There above, the patriarch Jacob 71 saw the heavenly host spread out, 72 when such a multitude of angels appeared to him.
**Malay:**
70 Di sana di atas, sang patriark Yakub 71 melihat rombongan surgawi membentang, 72 ketika sekumpulan malaikat menampakkan diri kepadanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Ma, per salirla, mo nessun diparte 74 da terra i piedi, e la regola mia 75 rimasa è per danno de le carte.
query.result:
**English:**
73 But to escape it, now none departs 74 from the earth with his feet, and my rule 75 has remained for the harm of the charts.
**Malay:**
73 Tetapi, untuk melarikan diri darinya, sekarang tidak seorang pun 74 melangkahkan kakinya dari tanah, dan peraturanku 75 tetap ada untuk merugikan peta-peta.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Le mura che solieno esser badia 77 fatte sono spelonche, e le cocolle 78 sacca son piene di farina ria.
query.result:
**English:**
76 The walls that used to be beautiful 77 have become caves, and the niches 78 are sacks full of bad flour.
**Malay:**
76 Dinding-dinding yang dulunya indah 77 telah menjadi gua-gua, dan relung-relungnya 78 adalah karung-karung yang penuh dengan tepung yang buruk.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 La carne d’i mortali è tanto blanda, 86 che giù non basta buon cominciamento 87 dal nascer de la quercia al far la ghianda.
query.result:
**English:**
85 The flesh of mortals is so soft, 86 that down there a good beginning is not enough 87 from the birth of the oak tree to the making of the acorn.
**Malay:**
85 Daging manusia sangat lembut, 86 sehingga di bawah sana permulaan yang baik tidak cukup 87 dari kelahiran pohon ek hingga pembuatan biji ek.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Veramente Iordan vòlto retrorso 95 più fu, e ’l mar fuggir, quando Dio volse, 96 mirabile a veder che qui ’l soccorso».
query.result:
**English:**
94 Truly Jordan turned back 95 more, and the sea fled, when God willed, 96 a marvelous thing to see that here the help.
**Malay:**
94 Sungguh Sungai Yordan berbalik arah 95 lebih banyak, dan laut melarikan diri, ketika Tuhan menghendaki, 96 menakjubkan untuk melihat bahwa di sini pertolongan itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Così mi disse, e indi si raccolse 98 al suo collegio, e ’l collegio si strinse; 99 poi, come turbo, in sù tutto s’avvolse.
query.result:
**English:**
97 Thus he spoke to me, and then he gathered 98 with his company, and the company huddled together; 99 then, like a whirlwind, they all whirled upwards.
**Malay:**
97 Demikian katanya kepadaku, dan kemudian dia berkumpul 98 dengan kelompoknya, dan kelompok itu berkumpul rapat; 99 kemudian, seperti angin puyuh, mereka semua berputar ke atas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 S’io torni mai, lettore, a quel divoto 107 trïunfo per lo quale io piango spesso 108 le mie peccata e ’l petto mi percuoto,
109 tu non avresti in tanto tratto e messo 110 nel foco il dito, in quant’ io vidi ’l segno 111 che segue il Tauro e fui dentro da esso.
query.result:
**English:**
106 If ever I return, reader, to that devout 107 triumph for which I often weep 108 for my sins and beat my breast,
109 you would not have put your finger in the fire 110 for as long as I saw the sign 111 that follows Taurus, and I was inside it.
**Malay:**
106 Jika aku kembali, pembaca, ke kemenangan saleh itu 107 yang sering membuatku menangis 108 karena dosa-dosaku dan aku memukul dada,
109 kamu tidak akan meletakkan jarimu di dalam api 110 selama aku melihat tanda 111 yang mengikuti Taurus, dan aku berada di dalamnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 O glorïose stelle, o lume pregno 113 di gran virtù, dal quale io riconosco 114 tutto, qual che si sia, il mio ingegno,
115 con voi nasceva e s’ascondeva vosco 116 quelli ch’è padre d’ogne mortal vita, 117 quand’ io senti’ di prima l’aere tosco;
118 e poi, quando mi fu grazia largita 119 d’entrar ne l’alta rota che vi gira, 120 la vostra regïon mi fu sortita.
query.result:
**English:**
112 O glorious stars, o light pregnant 113 with great virtue, from which I acknowledge 114 all, whatever it may be, my genius,
115 with you was born and with you was hidden 116 he who is the father of all mortal life, 117 when I first felt the Tuscan air;
118 and then, when I was granted the grace 119 to enter the high circle that turns you, 120 your region was assigned to me.
**Malay:**
112 Wahai bintang-bintang yang mulia, wahai cahaya yang mengandung 113 kebajikan yang besar, daripadanya aku mengakui 114 semua, apa pun itu, kecerdasanku,
115 bersamamu lahir dan bersamamu tersembunyi 116 dia yang adalah bapa dari semua kehidupan fana, 117 ketika pertama kali aku merasakan udara Tuscan;
118 dan kemudian, ketika aku diberi rahmat 119 untuk memasuki lingkaran tinggi yang memutarmu, 120 wilayahmu diberikan kepadaku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 A voi divotamente ora sospira 122 l’anima mia, per acquistar virtute 123 al passo forte che a sé la tira.
query.result:
**English:**
121 To you my soul devoutly prays 122 to acquire the virtue 123 that strongly draws it to itself.
**Malay:**
121 Kepadamu jiwaku berdoa dengan khusyuk 122 untuk memperoleh kebajikan 123 yang dengan kuat menariknya kepadanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 Vidi la figlia di Latona incensa 140 sanza quell’ ombra che mi fu cagione 141 per che già la credetti rara e densa.
query.result:
**English:**
139 I saw the daughter of Latona burning 140 without that shadow that was the cause 141 for which I once believed her to be rare and dense.
**Malay:**
139 Aku melihat putri Latona terbakar 140 tanpa bayangan itu yang menjadi penyebabnya 141 yang dulu membuatku percaya bahwa dia langka dan padat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
142 L’aspetto del tuo nato, Iperïone, 143 quivi sostenni, e vidi com’ si move 144 circa e vicino a lui Maia e Dïone.
query.result:
**English:**
142 The appearance of your son, Hyperion, 143 there I endured, and saw how Maia and Dione 144 move around and near him.
**Malay:**
142 Penampilan putramu, Hyperion, 143 di sana kutahan, dan kulihat bagaimana Maia dan Dione 144 bergerak di sekitar dan dekatnya.
